metadata.name: Everyone and No One - Edition #1
metadata.description: The Mystery Novel NFT gives holders exclusive access to unlock the complete digital ebook 'Everyone and No One', a murder mystery novel featuring Psychedelics Anonymous characters, as well as exclusive access to unlock all upcoming sequels in an ongoing ebook series of mystery/sci-fi novels featuring PFP characters that YOU own. More info on MysteryNovelNFT.com
